name: Rosicrucian-Paracelsian Network
description: Intellectual network of the early 17th century centered on the Rosicrucian manifestos, German Christian theosophy (Jacob Boehme), Paracelsian medicine, and the Prague court of Rudolf II. Spans c. 1540-1660 and includes the TÃ¼bingen Circle, English Rosicrucians, and political patrons of the 'Rosicrucian hope.'
